title: Gerrard, Beattie & Knapp Realtors - (similar to) Belwe {BJ}
content:
this is a type face used for a real estate firm in seattle. I am working on a mailer and realize I would be better off with the real thing (the face)   
vs. the scan I got. Any help would as usual be greatly appreciated. Ole   
   
 ![Type? 72.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105332im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1036.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
Ole - It looks like Belwe by Georg Belwe, just slightly modified.   
   
Belwe is at myfonts.com.   
   
   
bj

I have read your older posts also but this is very informative and connective post and I must tell that you always come3 up with great posts.
